overview: Valuation for statutory purposes including rating. Examination of all taxes affecting property, including land tax. Compulsory acquisition and compensation.
intended learning outcomes: Demonstrate a sound understanding of taxation affecting property;
Be involved in a moot court.

assessments.description: Assignment 1 - Multiple Regression Analysis estimating the value of 6,000 properties. Excel worksheet & Word report required to be submitted. 1250 words (equivalent)
Assignment 2 - A full professional standard compensation valuation report. 1250 words

Mock Court Room Presentation - the student will be required to act as both an expert witness and also as a cross examiner based on the findings of Assignment 2 - compensation valuation, equivalent to 500 words per student. 500 words (equivalent). Hurdle requirement:. Students must satisfactory complete the Mock Court Room Presentation

Semester 2.Contact hours: 36 hours: 1 x 2 hours of lectures per week; 1 x 1 hour studio per week.

Prescribed texts: The Valuation of Real Estate, Australian Property Institute, Canberra, 2007.
